title: Collecting and Preparing Data
short-description: Prioritize focus on specific alarms to determine system load, investigate incidents, and understand underlying application performance.

title: Exploring Data
short-description: ICS systems generate alerts for critical system events. These alerts help operators to react appropriately to changes to the state of the ICS system. Each alarm requires a response. Optimize the alarms systems by tracking the right metrics to reduce issues.

title: Predictive Maintenance Analysis Methods
short-description: Ensure compliance and verify approved applications are not impacting the performance of the ICS system.

title: Method 1 : Anomaly Detection Method
short-description: Identify non-compliant machines by reviewing binary versions for inconsistency.

title: Method 2 : Unsupervised Learning Method
short-description: Identify historical data replication issues between the two locations - Primary and Disaster Recovery.

title: Method 3 : Supervised Learning Method
short-description: Track real time database metrics to better understand the performance and overall sizing of the database.

title: Implement Alerts / Dashboards
short-description: Ensure the integrity of the system and configuration information by identifying misconfigurations in specific components.
